```{r}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```
```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
poll_results <- house_elections %>% filter(party == "R" | party == "D") %>% mutate(Total_votes = general_votes + primary_votes)
```

```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
poll_graph <- ggplot(poll_results, aes(x = state, y = Total_votes, fill = party)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") + xlab("State") + ylab("Total Votes") + facet_wrap(~state)

poll_graph
```
